lines.text: You got a squeaky wheel on a vehicle?
Y'oughta bring that vehicle into my workshop for an overhaul.
What you want to go chasin' Pok√©mon for? Got some real nice cars to fix in here.
There's nothin' more satisfyin' than a day under the bonnet of a broke-down car!
I need me a holiday. Crawlin' under cars all day gets a bit tiresome.
How about you take over my workshop for a spell? I need a rest.
I just love the smell of axle grease in the mornin'!
Come back some time with a vehicle of yours. I'll have her hummin' sweetly!
